```{r}
#| include: false
library(DBI)
library(RSQLite)
library(DT)
library(tidyverse)


db_file <- "virtual_production.db"
# stops if no file found
stopifnot(file.exists(db_file))

con <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), db_file)  #connect to the database
```
```{r}
dbListTables(con) #list all tables
```
```{r}
dbListFields(con, "Productions") #list columns in Productions
```
```{r}
dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM Productions LIMIT 10;") #gets first 10 entries in Productions
```
```{r}
dbListFields(con, "ProductionCrew")
```
```{r}
dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM ProductionCrew LIMIT 10;") #gets first 10 entries in ProductionCrew
```
